title: Veggie Pasta
description: A simple vegetarian pasta dish with tomato sauce and cheese.
instructions: Mix together and top with cheese.

title: Chicken Curry
description: Spicy chicken curry served with rice.

title: Garden Salad
description: Fresh salad with lettuce, tomato, and cucumber.
instructions: Toss together with olive oil and lemon juice.

title: Beef Stir-Fry
description: Quick stir-fried beef with vegetables and soy sauce.

title: Fruit Smoothie
description: Refreshing smoothie made with banana, berries, and yogurt.
instructions: Blend banana, berries, yogurt, and honey until smooth.

title: Grilled Salmon
description: Tender grilled salmon fillet with lemon and herbs.
instructions: Season salmon with lemon, dill, salt, and pepper.

title: Lentil Soup
description: Hearty vegetarian soup with lentils and vegetables.
instructions: Simmer lentils with chopped vegetables and broth until tender.

title: Pancakes
description: Fluffy breakfast pancakes served with syrup.
instructions: Cook pancakes on a hot griddle.
